list.name: SPEEDLOADER
list.description: Colt fires two quick shots that slow targets. Deals <!card.accessory.skill.damage.scaleToLevel> damage.
list.descriptionHtml: Colt fires two quick shots that slow targets. Deals  damage.

list.name: SILVER-BULLET
list.description: Colt fires a bullet that destroys the environment and pierces Brawlers. Deals <!card.accessory.skill.damage.scaleToLevel> damage. Consumes ammo.
list.descriptionHtml: Colt fires a bullet that destroys the environment and pierces Brawlers. Deals  damage. Consumes ammo.
